org.lsmp.djep.djep
Class DVariable

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.nfunk.jep.Variable
          org.lsmp.djep.xjep.XVariable
              org.lsmp.djep.djep.DVariable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MatrixVariable
public class DVariable
extends XVariable

Holds all info about a variable. Has a name, an equation, a dimension (or sent of dimensions if matrix or tensor) and also a set of PartialDerivative. The derivatives are stored in a hashtable index by the sorted names of derivatives. i.e. d^2f/dxdy, and d^2f/dydx will both be indexed by {"x","y"}. df/dx is indexed by {"x"}, d^2f/dx^2 is index by {"x","x"}. Partial derivatives are calculated as required by the findDerivative method.

Author:
Rich Morris Created on 26-Oct-2003

makeDerivString

public static java.lang.String makeDerivString(java.lang.String rootname,
                                               java.lang.String[] dnames)
Produces a string to represent the derivative. The string will be of the form "dx^2/dxdy". This string is used to index the derivatives of a variable.

Parameters:
rootname - name of the variable we are calculating the derivative of.
dnames - An array of the names of each of the partial derivatives.
Returns:
the string representation

setDerivative

public void setDerivative(java.lang.String[] derivnames,
                          PartialDerivative eqn)
Sets the derivative wrt the variables specified in deriv names. Note the names are sorted so that d^2z/dxdy = d^2z/dydx.

findDerivativeSorted

public PartialDerivative findDerivativeSorted(java.lang.String[] derivnames,
                                              DJep jep)
                                       throws ParseException
Finds the derivative of this variable wrt the names. If the derivative already exists just return that. Otherwise use the visitor to calculate the derivative. If the derivative cannot be calculated (say if the equation is null) then return null.

Parameters:
derivnames -
dv -
Returns:
The derivative or null if it cannot be calculated.
Throws:
ParseException
